unnormalised: Hey folks, interesting reads on training! My experience echoes this. Remember Milkha Singh’s rigorous sessions?
normalised: Hey folks, interesting reads on training! My experience echoes this. Remember Milkha Singh’s rigorous sessions?

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma at NIS Patiala always emphasized personalized plans. I heard somewhere that Virat Kohli's gym alone is like 2000 sq ft. Proper diet along with strength training got me from struggling to run 5 km to competing in the local marathon. It's an investment like Rs. 5000 for good running shoes. Keep pushing!
normalised: Doctor Sharma at N I S Patiala always emphasized personalized plans. I heard somewhere that Virat Kohli's gym alone is like two thousand square feet. Proper diet along with strength training got me from struggling to run five kilometer to competing in the local marathon. It's an investment like rupee five thousand for good running shoes. Keep pushing!
